Line1.BC3FF: To my bold, beloved fool. I pray this letter finds you in Zarbinzet before you depart. I canâ€™t stand the thought of you tramping through the swamp without my voice in your pocket, nagging you along.
Line3.BC3FF: You will be the one to find the tomb of Akarat, I know it in my bones. Let the Light be your guide... and our love be your courage.
VoiceDir3.BC3FF: Genuine. Sending all his love and hope.
